description: A Colorado paramedic was sentenced Friday to five years in prison in the death of Elijah McClain, a Black pedestrian who was given a lethal dose of ketamine in 2019 after a confrontation with police.
title: Paramedic sentenced to 5 years in prison in death of Elijah McClain

description: Deepfake images that graft a child’s face onto sexually explicit material are easily found in top image search results on leading search engines.
title: Fake nude photos with faces of underage celebrities top some search engine results

description: WASHINGTON — President Joe Biden announced Friday that the U.S. will drop food aid into the Gaza Strip, noting that the humanitarian aid flowing into the region for Palestinians is insufficient.
title: Biden announces U.S. will airdrop food aid into Gaza as famine concerns grow

description: Susie — a longtime operative who once worked for Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis — has brought a low-drama approach to the Trump campaign.
title: 'She sits in a tough chair': Meet Susie Wiles, the operative trying to guide Trump through four indictments to the White House

description: Researchers say ancient scrolls from almost 2,000 years ago, which were buried under layers of volcanic ash from the eruption of Italy's Mount Vesuvius, have been decoded thanks to a team of engineers and papyrologists who managed to decipher some of the hidden text with the help of artificial intelligence.
title: A.I. used to decipher ancient scrolls from 2,000 years ago
